item.title: CVE-2022-2655|2024-08-03T00:46:03.372Z -- unknown -- classified%20listing%20pro%20-%20classified%20ads%20%26%20business%20directory%20plugin
item.description: The Classified Listing Pro WordPress plugin before 2.0.20 does not escape a generated URL before outputting it back in an attribute in an admin page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
